Introduction

Lee Han Gyul is a South Korean singer affiliated with MBK Entertainment and a member of the group IM. Initially, he was among the first four members to debut before joining "The Unit." In 2019, Hangyul competed in the popular survival show Produce 101, where he secured 7th place in the final episode, earning a spot in the boy group X1.

Following the disbandment of X1 in 2020, Hangyul began promoting as part of the duo "H&D" alongside Nam Dohyon. Later, in November 2020, he debuted as a member of the boy group BAE173.

He is a member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys.
